Html:
Hello,

Recently I moved over from java to C# and have been messing around with libraries like OpenTK and MonoGame (I dare not go near XNA as MonoGame supersedes it). but was curious if a port for MonoGame could be created.

Regards

Hi,

We were considering a port to MonoGame, but as much of the code is experimental in later commits and intertwined, it would require a rewrite. A port is possible though.
Although voxeliq (https://github.com/raistlinthewiz/voxeliq) is quite branched already and code-base is quite different, it can run on monogame.
